title: Enhancing Instructional Design Competency in Practice: Exploring Mechanical Vibration and Natural Modes through PBL with Kalimba

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can theoretically calculate the natural frequencies of each kalimba key by applying simple beam theory.
Learners can perform vibration mode simulations incorporating realistic boundary conditions using finite element analysis (FEA) software.
Learners can experimentally measure natural frequencies using vibration sensors and MATLAB-based spectrum analyzers and compare results with theoretical/numerical findings.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
